1.text: And Benjamin begat Bela his first-born, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,

2.text: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.

3.text: And Bela had sons: Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,

4.text: and Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,

5.text: and Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.

6.text: And these are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of fathers’ houses of the inhabitants of Geba, and they carried them captive to Manahath:

7.text: and Naaman, and Ahijah, and Gera, he carried them captive: and he begat Uzza and Ahihud.

8.text: And Shaharaim begat children in the field of Moab, after he had sent them away; Hushim and Baara were his wives.

9.text: And he begat of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcam,

10.text: and Jeuz, and Shachia, and Mirmah. These were his sons, heads of fathers’ houses.

11.text: And of Hushim he begat Abitub and Elpaal.

12.text: And the sons of Elpaal: Eber, and Misham, and Shemed, who built Ono and Lod, with the towns thereof;

13.text: and Beriah, and Shema, who were heads of fathers’ houses of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who put to flight the inhabitants of Gath;

15.text: and Zebadiah, and Arad, and Eder,

16.text: and Michael, and Ishpah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah,

17.text: and Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hizki, and Heber,

18.text: and Ishmerai, and Izliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal,

19.text: and Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,

20.text: and Elienai, and Zillethai, and Eliel,

21.text: and Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimei,

22.text: and Ishpan, and Eber, and Eliel,

23.text: and Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,

24.text: and Hananiah, and Elam, and Anthothijah,

25.text: and Iphdeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak,

26.text: and Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,

27.text: and Jaareshiah, and Elijah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.

28.text: These were heads of fathers’ houses throughout their generations, chief men: these dwelt in Jerusalem.

29.text: And in Gibeon there dwelt the father of Gibeon, Jeiel, whose wife’s name was Maacah;

30.text: and his first-born son Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,

31.text: and Gedor, and Ahio, and Zecher.

32.text: And Mikloth begat Shimeah. And they also dwelt with their brethren in Jerusalem, over against their brethren.

33.text: And Ner begat Kish; and Kish begat Saul; and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchi-shua, and Abinadab, and Eshbaal.

34.text: And the son of Jonathan was Merib-baal; and Merib-baal begat Micah.

35.text: And the sons of Micah: Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.

36.text: And Ahaz begat Jehoaddah; and Jehoaddah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza.

37.text: And Moza begat Binea; Raphah was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.

38.text: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these: Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.

39.text: And the sons of Eshek his brother: Ulam his first-born, Jeush the second, and Eliphelet the third.

40.text: And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valor, archers, and had many sons, and sons’ sons, a hundred and fifty. All these were of the sons of Benjamin.
